amendment.description: Amendment prohibited use of funds for implementation of section 2703 of Public Law 109-234 with respect to specified acreage along Highway 90 in Gulfport, Mississippi.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 30 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to implement section 2703 of Public Law 109-234.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Taylor amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Taylor.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Taylor amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
